title: Bewildered
description: MEANT TO BE MARRIEDIn all my years as a matchmaking ghost, I've never seen two mortals so meant to be married as Michael Connor and Simone Hartman. But do they realize it?Michael thinks he's too sedate, though his body goes into overdrive whenever Simone is near. And Simone... Why the lass thinks romance is for fools...!But if that Connor boy imagines he'll sell my house before he carries Simone in as his bride, well, he's in for the surprise of his life...Those Connor brothers don't stand a chance of staying single -- once they cross the threshold and become Jock's Boys!
author: Jennifer Greene
